OK so here's what I need from Publix this week. This covers breakfasts and lunches mostly.

Breakfasts:
Bananas, old-fashioned oats, whole milk, eggs

Lunches:
Sourdough bread, deli turkey, Swiss cheese, romaine lettuce, tomatoes

Snacks:
Greek yogurt, mixed nuts, dark chocolate

What You Are NOT Buying Today:
Round toilet seat, paper towels, the elongated toilet seat thing

That Cart Builds:
You're fully operational for the week. Calm, cohesive, no waste.
